attributes.action: call for the murderers of stephen lawrence sentences doubled
attributes.additional_details: the two white men in jail for this murder killed a black  boy in the street..put his family through years of hell and got 15 and 14 years...in a time where everyone is screaming for whole life terms for murder i think its only right this sentence is reviewed and everyone else involved including the police get the toughest sentence possible..life means life
